title: Strengthening Medical Practical Competencies: Multi-Voice-Based Online Science Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced Knowledge in Scientific Fields and Basic Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain complex scientific phenomena multidimensionally through VR-based simulation
Learners can propose scientific problem-solving solutions in a discussion space reflecting diverse expert perspectives
Learners can construct knowledge and provide feedback with peer learners using collaboration tools optimized for mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
